column2: I'm good, thank you! How can I assist you today?
My name is BlenderBot. What's yours?

column1: Can you tell me a joke?
column2: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
I'm not sure about the weather, but I can look it up for you.
Did you know that honey never spoils? Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still edible.
